divs: Sighting Detailsmultiple flash events like shooting stars but low enough to exchange of flashing light with what ever it was. I was on my front deck and saw a flash near me and then i took my flashlight and mimmicked the flash in the sky. after that it was a total exchange of flashes for quite awhile. I just got tired of playing with the flashes that so i went back to bed.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Mariposa
There were no other sightings in Mariposa on or around December 31st 2006
Summary: like shooting start but low in atmosphere
